external_references.description: Jeff Johnson, Fred Plan, Adrian Sanchez, Renato Fontana, Jake Nicastro, Dimiter Andonov, Marius Fodoreanu, Daniel Scott. (2023, April 20). 3CX Software Supply Chain Compromise Initiated by a Prior Software Supply Chain Compromise; Suspected North Korean Actor Responsible. Retrieved August 25, 2025.

objects.description: During the [3CX Supply Chain Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0057), [AppleJeus](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1049) first compromised an “end-of-life" trading software application which was downloaded and executed inside the 3CX enterprise environment. The second compromise modified the Windows and macOS build environments used to distribute the 3CX software to their customer base.(Citation: Mandiant 3cx UNC4736 2023)
